name: OGDPS Discord Rich Presence
description: A Discord Rich Presence mod for Geode

funny-mode.name: Just, dont...
funny-mode.description: Don't do it... you know you shouldn't...

private-info.name: Show Sensitive Information
private-info.description: Allow to show local data like locally saved levels' names in the creator tab in your Discord activity status.

show-time.name: Show Timestamps
show-time.description: Will add "x:xx elapsed" to your status.

show-percent.name: Show Percent
show-percent.description: <cr>Windows.</c> This will show your current percent in a level while in a run.

show-total-time.name: Show Total Time In Editor
show-total-time.description: Displays the amount of time you've spent working on the level in total across all sessions.

idling.name: Show Idle Status
idling.description: Will change your status to idle when the game is unfocused.

issues.info: Please report issues to the GitHub repository.
